lore: When humans began to capture, sell and enslave Brownies, all the strength of their people fell upon them. They were small and fast, and they were many.\n\nWhen a Brownie reaches a certain age, it usually has considerable combat experience. These individuals are called Captains by their own kind, and they are experts in finding enemy weak points at a glance during battle.
menagerieDialog: Could we slow down a little, buddy?
I'M GONNA BASH THEIR BRAINS IN!\n\n(Its threats would seem a lot more promising if this creature's voice wasn't so high-pitched.)
I like to think of myself as the leader of our group. Don't worry - you're my second in command!
(Both its weapon and its temper are comically oversized for its body.)
name: Brownie Captain
